committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning on the second Monday in November each year as Youth Appreciation Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the week beginning on the second Monday in November each year as "Youth Appreciation Week". Requests that the President urge the people of the United States to observe such week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning on the second Monday in November each year as Youth Appreciation Week.
